text.tspan: Annual growth of the income or consumption of the poorest 40% vs.
The growth rate is calculated between two household surveys â€“ the most recent survey available in 2022 and a survey falling
approximately five years earlier. In countries below the dotted line, income or consumption growth is higher for the poorest
40% of the population than the national average.
Growth rate among the total population
Note: Depending on the country and year, the data relates to income measured after taxes and benefits, or to consumption, per capita.
